product_name: Nathan QuickShot Plus Insulated Handheld Gel/Water Bottle
long_description: The Nathan QuickShot Plus Insulated Handheld gel/water bottle gives you a quick shot of hydration whether training or racing, and keeps fluids cold longer with a reflective, insulated flask.
short_description: The Nathan QuickShot Plus Insulated Handheld gel/water bottle gives you a quick shot of hydration whether training or racing, and keeps fluids cold longer with a reflective, insulated flask.
